title: Mayday.Air.Crash.Investigations.S03.E12.Runaway.Train.DVD.720p.x
description:
Runaway Train

Aired on 11/30/2005, Narrated by Jonathan Aris. (the third and last "Crash Scene Investigation" episode)

On 12 May 1989, a 69-car freight train goes out of control while descending from California's Cajon Pass. It derails in a residential neighborhood of San Bernardino after reaching speeds in excess of 100 miles per hour (160 km/h). Two residents and two train crew are killed in the initial crash. More than a week later, an underground gasoline pipelineÃ¢â‚¬â€damaged by earth-moving equipment during the post-crash cleanupÃ¢â‚¬â€ruptures and sparks a fire that kills another two people.
